title: Enable HDR output mode for MediaPlayerElement for Third-party App
body:
Fact 1:
Current only Microsoft Movie & TV app have this capability, when User play HDR video the TV will indicate it's output HDR color format

comments.body:
amend 2:
Netflix on Xbox also have this HDR Video output capability too, why not make it restricted capability.

amend:
XAML/C# base project, if c++ WinRT Component solution can solve this issue will acceptable.
